title: Brian's Song
description: Winner of five Emmy awardsTwo men. Once names Gale Sayers, the other Brian Piccolo. They came from different parts of the country. They competed fiercely for the same job. One liked to talk; the other was shy. One was white; the other black. This is the story of how they came to know each other, fight each other, and help each other. . . .
author: William Blinn
